2. Determine if the identified item is a single, since the question asks about their first Australian top 40 hit single ahead of 1980. The format column indicates that this item is an LP (Long Play), which refers to albums, not singles. (Row 2 & Row 4)
3. Check if there are any other items released in Australia ahead of 1980 with a different format than LP, as singles usually come in formats like CD or cassette (MC). However, the given table only includes the LP format for releases from 1980 in Australia.
4. The question does not specify whether this single needs to be their first release ever. So even though we cannot find a single released ahead of 1980 in Australia, it is still possible that they had other singles before that became their first Australian top 40 hit.
5. The table does not provide information about the chart positions for each release, so we cannot definitively say if this specific release was indeed their first Australian top 40 hit or not.
